name: SquareScape Alpha
description:
Notice: This game is in it's early test/development phase. The current build is simply a test project for something I will be adding onto the game in the near future. Updates may be slow, but I will frequently be releasing updates that add something new. 

SquareScape is a 2D top-down #shooter game. Walk around a labyrinth an shoot as many enemies as you can!

Join my discord: https://discord.gg/RGmm7D6
